    • Uses of PlcConnection in org.apache.plc4x.java

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlcConnection PlcDriverManager.getConnection(String url)
      Connects to a PLC using the given plc connection string.
      PlcConnection PlcDriverManager.getConnection(String url, PlcAuthentication authentication)
